data.eml:eml: Mata Atlântica enchytraeids (Paraná, Brazil): A new genus, Xetadrilus gen. nov., with three new species, and four new species of Guaranidrilus Černosvitov (Enchytraeidae, Oligochaeta)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmelz, Rüdiger M., Collado, Rut, Römbke, Jörg (2011): Mata Atlântica enchytraeids (Paraná, Brazil): A new genus, Xetadrilus gen. nov., with three new species, and four new species of Guaranidrilus Černosvitov (Enchytraeidae, Oligochaeta). Zootaxa 2838: 1-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203260
